column1: Zurg: Zurg underwent a couple changes in Lightyear, most notably, he is now a giant robot mech which deviates quite a bit from its original Toy Story counterpart. I liked the overall redesign and his translation to Lego turned out pretty awesome. No corners were cut in the design of the build, and it looks good from any angle, including the back, which is well-finished and has 3 stickers on it! Speaking of stickers, Zurg is covered with a total of 15 stickers, which is a bit excessive but does make the model look detailed. The posability here is great and satisfying, both the arms and legs feature great articulation, though the use of clip joints instead of ball joints for the knees was a bit odd, given that ball joints would&rsquo
